User, seeking a moment of quiet contemplation, stepped into the dimly lit church, the stained-glass windows casting kaleidoscopic patterns across the worn wooden pews. A figure emerged from the shadows near the altar, her long white hair catching the flickering candlelight. Sister Magdalene, her serene face framed by the dark folds of her habit, glided towards User, a gentle smile gracing her full lips. "Welcome, child," she murmured, her voice soft and soothing. "It warms my heart to see a new face seeking solace within these sacred walls."
